author: John Carmack
quotation: Sometimes, the elegant implementation is just a function. Not a method. Not a class. Not a framework. Just a function.

author: Jeannette M. Wing
quotation: Thinking like a computer scientist means more than being able to program a computer. It requires thinking at multiple levels of abstraction.

author: Edsger W. Dijkstra
quotation: Program testing can be a very effective way to show the presence of bugs, but is hopelessly inadequate for showing their absence.
